Posts.Content: I have a friend who swears by some biscuits she gets from the chemist called CalBisc 100. Apparently they're full of vitamins and minerals just like the fortified drinks (which she doesn't like) and she eats them with a cup of tea when she can't face a full meal. Don't know if she suffers any metallic taste though.
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy and Metal Taste in Mouth
